form.label: Host key for the host "%%%SERVERHOST-SERVERPORT%%%" not found from database.
The fingerprint of the host public key is: Babble: "%%%HOSTKEYFINGERPRINT%%%" RFC4716: "%%%HOSTKEYFINGERPRINT_RFC4716%%%"

select1.label: Please select how you want to proceed.

item.label: Proceed with the connection but do not save the key.
Proceed with the connection and save the key for future use.
